titles.title: No Special Treatment for Members of Congress Act

To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to prohibit Government contributions under the Federal employees health benefit program towards Exchange health insurance coverage of Members of Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 1/10/2014--Introduced. No Special Treatment for Members of Congress Act - Amends the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to prohibit federal government contributions under the Federal Employees Health Benefits (FEHB) Program on behalf of a Member of Congress for coverage under an American Health Benefit Exchange.
